name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Wilfredo CASTRO, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson and zappala, jj.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Wilfredo CASTRO, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The judgments of sentence imposed by the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia are affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Michael Clarke, Asst. Dist. Attys., Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
462 A.2d 215
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Wilfredo CASTRO, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 18, 1983.
Decided July 8, 1983.
Charlotte Nichols, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Michael Clarke, Asst. Dist. Attys., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson and zappala, jj.
